name: slangy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
Slangy language contains a lot of slang expressions: His language is very slangy. Her writing style is often annoyingly slangy.
More examplesFewer examplesThere's nothing rude or slangy in what she says.His writing was punchy, conversational, and sometimes slangy.She writes very good smart, slangy dialogue.By "colloquial", I do not mean slangy or substandard language.
